thread.title: BEN
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by BEN

author: BEN
title: BEN
text: The Japan Railpass is an essential investment for your next trip to Japan. No question about it. For the cost of just one Shinkansen journey (in our case, Tokyo to Kyoto), you get a pass that will allow you to travel on ANY Japan Rail train, ANYTIME! The Japanese rail network is fast, efficient and spotless... And goes everywhere. You will not regret purchasing a JR Railpass, but you will definitely regret it if you don't.
